name: The Flooded Grounds HD Remaster
description:
This isn't a game so much as a lighting demo.  If you go into parts of the water you'll be unable to get back to the surface and have to quit. I'll fix this in the next release.

The scene was originally created for the Unity built-in render pipeline, but I wanted to see what it would look like updated. The Flooded Grounds was created by Sandro Tatinashvili and published for free on the asset store. I added the insect monsters, made by Maksim Bugrimov so I could have something a bit more interesting to do AI experiments with.

Originally I had UFPS implemented which had a complete combat cycle with the bugs, but ran into an issue that I'm waiting on support on. If I can get it fixed I will republish with combat re-enabled, and probably add swimming.
